00032 # Code for saving Answers to a file
00033 # function, not a method
00034 # Code in .pm files can access the disk.
00035 
00036 
00037 sub saveAnswerToFile {
00038       my $logFileID = shift;
00039       my $string = shift;
00040       # We want to allow acces only to predetermined files
00041       # We accomplish this by translating legal IDs into a file name
00042 
00043       my $rh_allowableFiles = {
00044          preflight => 'preflight.log',
00045          questionnaire => 'questionnaire.txt',
00046 
00047         };
00048       my $error=undef;
00049       my $logFileName = $rh_allowableFiles->{$logFileID};
00050       if ( defined($logFileName) ) {
00051         my $accessLog = Global::getCourseLogsDirectory().$logFileName;
00052         #$error = "access Log is $accessLog";
00053         #$error .="string is $string";
00054         open(LOG, ">>$accessLog") or $error.= "Can't open course access log $accessLog";
00055         print LOG $string;  #no format is forced on data.
00056         close(LOG);
00057       } else {
00058         $error = "Error: The file ID $logFileID is not recognized.";
00059       }
00060     return $error ;
00061 }
